title: [Gameplay] New Swain Drops FPS Like Crazy
body:
So, my pc is a total dinosaur. It barely holds 60 fps at the lowest graphics settings. For some reason, though, Swain drops my fps like crazy. It's like his character model is fully tessellated. It's super detailed, his cape is super fluid. My pc literally cannot handle it. I know that's "my fault" and all, but I cannot be the only person experiencing this. Riot always talks about how they try to support older pc's. Zoe's a new champ and she doesn't have that problem. Maybe they just forgot to scale back his model on low settings? Idk. All I know is I just lost the hell out of a ranked game because swain dropped my fps from 60 to 15-20 simply by walking into frame. I know it's him, because my pc never has this problem, and because I have my full usual frame rate unless he's on screen. My frames honestly don't drop that bad in a five v five teamfight during baron. Like I said, I'm on the lowest possible graphics settings, and my pc can manage 10 or 15 frames on high. Do you guys have any idea what's wrong? Riot, are you listening? Is this the new norm, are all new champs going to be like this now, or is it just a bug?

1) Play on a low spec pc. (I guess, idk if higher end stations have this problem)

2) Play against swain. (Idk if the summoner controlling swain experiences the lag, or if his team does)

3) Have swain walk into your frame. 

4) Lose the game because you drop fps for no reason. Wohooo

replies.body:
Hello there!

We have a tool that lets us get more detailed performance info from your games. If you add a setting to your game.cfg file.

Cfg file is in C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config

You will need to add it under the [Performance] section.

LiveProfile=1

If you have that section included in your game.cfg, when you finish a game, it will generate a log that we can use to analyze the performance. You can find that log here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Performance Logs

With a format like "2017-12-06T22-05-40_PerfDump.rpd"

If you set up that LiveProfile setting and generate any logs like that, we could use them to look more into the issue.
My settings are on medium-high and everything runs smoothly until he is on the screen.
I'm all medium and everything is good until swain comes into the picture.

So is it only an issue when vsing a Swain?
